summary.Title: We are looking for customer service agents at Copenhagen Airport, CPH
summary.JobHeadline: We are looking for customer service agents at Copenhagen Airport, CPH

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are looking for customer service agents at Copenhagen Airport, CPH
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for service- and safety-minded people for part-time employment at Copenhagen Airport, CPH. The job is seasonal until the end of October 2025 but with the possibility that the season may get extended. Working hours are in the morning on weekdays and weekends. The working hours consist of approx. 80 hours per month divided into 4 hours per day. We therefore expect you to be flexible with regard to working hours.

Become a valued member of our team dedicated to providing exceptional service for our client, Delta Air Lines.

The airport is a security restricted area and potential candidates must be security cleared. A criminal record and photo ID must therefore be brought to the job interview.

         Professional qualifications:

  • 20 years of age and older
  • Secondary education, HHX, HTX or similar
  • Strong English skills both in writing and speaking
  • Other language skills will be an advantage, but are not a requirement.


    Personal qualifications:
  • You are service minded, well groomed and presentable
  • You are security oriented
  • You exude calmness and authority
  • You can comply with instructions and follow procedures
  • You are in good physical shape


    We offer:
  • An internal training period
  • An exciting workplace
  • Challenging and varied tasks


Email your application to: icts.denmark@ictseurope.com
Applications are accepted by email only. Please include a list of your qualifications (CV) and photo.
